text: @nytimes Can you go any lower @nytimes - there is a PANDEMIC,PEOPLE ARE DYING - NO-ONE CARES that  @FLOTUS IS DECORATING, PEOPLE ARE LOSING THEIR HOMES, FAMILIES ARE LOSING THEIR UNEMPLOYMENT - TALK ABOUT HOW SHE SHOULD BE TELLING HER HUSBAND TO DO HIS JOB #COVID19 #mondaythoughts
